name: BOT-any
description:
How to Play:
WASD to move
Move onto an empty plot tile to plant a seedling. Rolling onto a plot that already has a seedling will crush it and reset the plot back to empty. Try to fill up as many plots as you can!

Made in Unreal Engine 4 for the Indie Game Dev Beginners jam
Background music from PlayOnLoop.com
Licensed under Creative Commons by Attribution 4.0

This is the first game jam I've ever participated in, and the first real game I've built! I did all the art myself, and kept the gameplay simple since I'm new to development. There's a lot of things I wish I could've added to make it more interesting, but ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ 
Enjoy!


*probably doesn't work on mobile*
